attributes.title: Overall a horrible app
attributes.review: After installing this app that works worse than an unplugged toaster my phone kept glitching up. After I uninstall the app my phone is fine but every time I have the app my phone goes crazy. My phone literally flies out of my hand and through my window. One time the app was so powerful it went threw my neighbors window too!ğŸ¤¯ I had to pay 69 dollars back to fix. My pet zebra I stole from the zoo also goes absolutely crazy when I have the app! It ate my mother because the app drives him crazy! Now Iâ€™m short windows and a mother! I also have an urge to slap people when I have this app! It has gotten so bad I smacked my teacher and boss right in the kitty! I was fired! This app has turned my life around and NOT FOR THE BETTER! I have to put my zebra down too! This app costs to much money. Overall a 0/10 experience would not recommend.

attributes.review: This app insults me as a Cheetos fan since i can no longer look at one without thinking of the not so great spray tan of the blob fish that popped up when i first opened the app, i have now decided as a hispanic-indo-chinese-native american-venezuelan-puertorican-italian-brazilian woman that i cannot stan this app , it does not load correctly and takes ages to actually show any information. it will be the worst possible thing for me to do since it will make me lose my mind during this quarantine and now they are forcing the opening of schools making me have less time on my phone to attempt to work thsi app since it has so many glitches it actually makes me wanna kms . in over all this app is my last resort for news , i will now rely on tiktok and twitter which are more credible and reliable than this app. in conclusion i am ashamed of ever even downloading this app!

attributes.title: Absolutely terrifying
attributes.review: When I opened the app, there was an orange man who looked very constipated holding up a fist. I was very scared. This happened 5 days ago and still, every night I wake up in a cold sweat after seeing this man in my nightmares. When I got through the first steps of the app, there were even more pictures of the orange man! I donâ€™t understand why anyone would get this app. Apparently, some people even buy merch with this manâ€™s face or name on it! Every time I see someone in the street with a anything that has trump on it, (which is the orange manâ€™s name, for everyone who didnâ€™t know) I start violently vomiting all over. Itâ€™s becoming dangerous to my health and if you ask me, I think we should ban all of this from the United States forever, since this is severely effecting my physical (and mental) health. Please leave a similar review if you have had this experience.
